description:
COURSE DESCRIPTION

Hi ! My name is Ashish, On behalf of EDULINE INDIA, I welcome you to this comprehensive GRE MATH course. With more than 5 years of experience, i can assure, the flow of preparation in this course will be the shortest and the most effective path towards your GRE preparation.

Are you a student or a working professional ? No problem, If you are willing to spare 1.5 hours, twice a week, I assure you a score of 160+ in your GRE MATH section.

Feel free to preview sample videos so that you have an idea of what to expect in the rest of the course.

Thank you for your time and i look forward to helping you maximise your math proficiency .


PLAN OF ACTION

1. Read the article in section 1 for Practise pattern and free online resources.

2. Start with the basic VOCAB and PLUGGING IN ( Lecture 1 and 2) for the first week.

3. Try and cover two topics every week

3.1 Learn the basics by watching the concept video of every topic

3.2 Try to master the concept by solving the In-Class Assignment (2.5 mins per question)

P.S. KINDLY CHECK RESOURCES TO FIND ATTACHED IN CLASS ASSIGNMENT SHEETS

3.3 Check and Analyse your work by watching the explanation video.

4. Take full length mock tests regularly and analyse your score.
title: GRE Math made easy : Watch, Learn and Ace.
